place.name: EXTON
place.gazetteerText: EXTON, a parish in Dulverton sub-district, Somerset; on the river Exe, 5 miles NNE of Dulverton, and 1½ mile W of Combe-Row r. station. Post town, Brompton-Regis, under Tiverton. Acres, 4, 045. Real property, £3, 005. Pop., 410. Houses, 76. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Bath and Wells. Value, £380.* Patron, the Rev. G. B. Warren. The church is ancient. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
